params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The name of the game server cluster to retrieve, in the following form: projects/{project}/locations/{location}/realms/{realm-id}/gameServerClusters/{cluster}.

params.name: data.view
params.description: Optional. View for the returned GameServerCluster objects. When FULL is specified, the cluster_state field is also returned in the GameServerCluster object, which includes the state of the referenced Kubernetes cluster such as versions and provider info. The default/unset value is GAME_SERVER_CLUSTER_VIEW_UNSPECIFIED, same as BASIC, which does not return the cluster_state field.
